EmailTemplate.name: HCF - Action Hub INVITE to Spelthorne team leaders 29/10/14
EmailTemplate.subject: Calling all Challenge Team Leaders!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Your NCS journey is over. REAL LIFE has begun.
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
The Heathrow Community Fund: Inspiring Youth Programme is funding youth led activities in your area and we want you to be a part of it!
As a leader of {!Contact.Team__c} during the NCS programme you were responsible for co-ordinating and leading your team to collectively deliver a social action campaign.
Next week we are starting a new venture - Action Hubs - in Staines. This is your opportunity to be part of a vibrant new group of young people exploring the world of social action and creating positive change in your community.
Your NCS campaign was the first leg of your social action journey, Action Hubs are the next step in your Challenge adventure!
Click on the link below to get your ticket to the Action Hub Intro Night and find out what its all about. Bring along your friends and former team mates as well!
SPELTHORNE ACTION HUB Thurs 6th Nov, 5.30pm - 7.30pm at Brooklands College, Ashford.
For an insight into what Action Hubs are and what the Heathrow Community Fund: Inspiring Youth Programme is up to check out this video and blog:
Action Hub - Get Involved!
If you have any questions about the Action Hubs just reply to this email.
See you all there!
Rob The Challenge Society
